def find_new_capitals(T, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        N = case['']
        populations = case['populations']
        teleports = case['teleports']
        planets = [(populations[i], i + 1) for i in range(N)]
        planets.sort(reverse=True)
        connected = [[] for _ in range(N + 1)]
        for (v, u) in teleports:
            connected[v].append(u)
            connected[u].append(v)
        result = []
        for i in range(1, N + 1):
            infected = connected[i] + [i]
            new_capital = 0
            for (pop, idx) in planets:
                if idx not in infected:
                    new_capital = idx
                    break
            result.append(new_capital)
        results.append(result)
    return results

        for (v, u) in teleports:
            connected[v].append(u)

        result = []

            infected = connected[i] + [i]

                if idx not in infected:
                    new_capital = idx
                    break
            result.append(new_capital)
        results.append(result)
    return results
